name: Chargerzilla
description: Chargerzilla is a community-driven, AI-powered EV charging marketplace that connects property owners, EV charging networks, and businesses to EV drivers. Our platform increases utilization rates for charge point operators and unlocks new revenue streams for businesses such as hotels, commercial properties, and individual home owners.
one_liner: Chargerzilla is a community-driven, AI-powered EV charging marketplace that connects property owners, EV charging networks, and businesses to EV drivers. Our platform increases utilization rates for charge point operators and unlocks new revenue streams for businesses such as hotels, commercial properties, and individual home owners.
